title: Sportplatz 3 Sapins
text:
Sportplatz 3 Sapins is a <a href="stadium">stadium</a> in <a href="Echallens">Echallens</a>, <a href="Switzerland">Switzerland</a>. It is currently used for <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> matches and is the home ground of <a href="FC%20Echallens">FC Echallens</a>. The capacity is 2000 and is the opposite of the modern all seater stadiums in that it is standing-room only.
References.
https://int.soccerway.com/teams/switzerland/fc-echallens/venue/
